 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==grasp, support, attain== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּמַךְ‎</span> Pa\`el ***hold fast***; compare Phoenician and Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תמכאל‎</span> ***El hath sustained*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>386</sup> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>121</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>361</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect***. 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּֽמְכָה‎</span> [[Ps.63.9|Ps 63:9]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְמֹךְ‎</span> [[Prov.29.23|Prov 29:23]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְמֹ֑כוּ‎</span> [[Job.36.17|Job 36:17]]; [[Prov.5.5|Prov 5:5]], etc., ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמֹךְ‎</span> [[Ps.17.5|Ps 17:5]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמֹךְ‎</span> [[Isa.33.15|Isa 33:15]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺמֵךְ‎</span> [[Amos.1.5|Amos 1:5]]; [[Amos.1.8|Amos 1:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺמִיךְ‎</span> [[Ps.16.5|Ps 16:5]] (? read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵיךְ‎</span>- [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:51e»§ 51e</sup>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּמֵךְ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; &gt; 0l <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺסִיף‎</span>, [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמִיד‎</span>), etc.; — 

**1.** ***grasp, lay hold of***, with accusative of thing [[Gen.48.17|Gen 48:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Prov.31.19|Prov 31:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁלּח יד בְּ‎</span>); accusative of person (wisdom) [[Prov.3.18|Prov 3:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲזִיק‎</span>); accusative of thing (grasp and) ***wield*** [[Amos.1.5|Amos 1:5]]; [[Amos.1.8|Amos 1:8]]; [[Ps.16.5|Ps 16:5]] (see above) ***thou dost grasp my lot*** (i.e. take and cast it for me, compare modern Palestinian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***may Allah uphold my lot*** Bergheim<sup>PEF 1894, 194</sup>); figurative, [[Job.36.17|Job 36:17]] judgment and justice ***seize*** (thee; but see obscure and doubtful); [[Prov.5.5|Prov 5:5]] her steps ***lay hold of*** <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr> (keep the path to it); literal, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[Isa.33.15|Isa 33:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person [[Prov.28.17|Prov 28:17]] (or below **3**; meaning dubious); ***lay hold of***, ***attain***, honour, wealth (accusative) [[Prov.11.16|Prov 11:16]] (twice in verse). 

**2.** ***hold up, support***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיָדָיו‎</span> [[Exod.17.2|Exod 17:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person [[Isa.42.1|Isa 42:1]]; [[Ps.41.13|Ps 41:13]]; [[Ps.63.9|Ps 63:9]] accusative of person [[Isa.41.10|Isa 41:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental), [[Prov.29.23|Prov 29:23]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁפִּיל‎</span>), 

**3.** ***hold, keep***, with accusative of thing [[Prov.4.4|Prov 4:4]] let thy heart ***keep*** my words (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַר‎</span>); ***hold firmly*** [[Ps.17.5|Ps 17:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמֹ֫טוּ‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְחַבְלֵי חַטָּאתוֺ יִתָּמֵ֑ךְ‎</span> [[Prov.5.22|Prov 5:22]] ***in the cords of his sin is he seized*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָכַד‎</span>).
